SongName: Heart Attack (feat. Chrissy Costanza of Against the Current)

Lyric:
[00:09.170]Never put my love out on the line

[00:42.170]You make me glow, but I cover up
[00:54.170]'Cause I don't wanna fall in love
[00:56.170]Won't let it show, so I'm

[01:01.170]I think I'd have a heart attack

[01:11.170]I think I'd have a heart attack

[01:48.370]Won't let it show,
